panama.filter
Class SearchPropertyComparator

java.lang.Object
  panama.filter.Filter
      panama.filter.PropertyComparator
          panama.filter.RegExpPropertyComparator
              panama.filter.SearchPropertyComparator

public class SearchPropertyComparator
extends RegExpPropertyComparator

The Filter used for Table searching. Basically it matches .*pattern.* and it is case insensitive.

Author:
Ridcully
